Text.Page:
Want to learn how to become Silver-Tongued? Earn the coins required from October 1st to October 6th, and exchange them for the Jadewing Mounts. Learn (and use) all 5, to unlock that title!
Using the power of illusions as well as being their silver tongue to confuse many a hunter, the Silverwings have been the most seldomly seen creatures of all - my search for them is neverending.
